snippet: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann characterized recent losses as a blip on a longer path of growth and progress for the men’s team.
abstract: United States men's national soccer team coach Jurgen Klinsmann sees loss to Mexico that would have sent team to 2017 Confederations Cup tournament as minor bump; says team's focus is now on World Cup qualification process.
lead_paragraph: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann characterized recent losses as a blip on a longer path of growth and progress for the men’s team.

headline.main: Jurgen Klinsmann Sees U.S. Loss to Mexico as Minor Bump
headline.print_headline: U.S. Coach Sees Loss to Mexico as Minor Bump

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
